per_round.question: What is your favorite book and why?
per_round.answer: My favorite book is Harry Potter. This is because we learn a lot about friendships from that book

per_round.question: Can you share a specific example of a friendship lesson from Harry Potter?
per_round.answer: All of the friends were very loyal and they cared for each other

per_round.question: How does the loyalty among Harry, Ron, and Hermione impact the story?
per_round.answer: I believe that they has each others backs all throughout the story, so the difficult times felt easier for them

per_round.question: Can you describe a specific scene where their loyalty helped them overcome a challenge?
per_round.answer: In the end of the book, they were able to defeat the evil because they worked in team

per_round.question: What specific actions did each character take in that final scene to contribute to their success?
per_round.answer: All of them were not afraid to stand up against the villain of the book and I believe that it something everyone should practice
